articles.title: Celine Dion reveals she has a rare neurological syndrome - CNN
articles.description: Celine Dion is postponing several Europe tour dates after the recent diagnosis of a rare neurological disorder that doesn't allow her "to sing the way I'm used to," she announced.
articles.content:

articles.title: Celine Dion cancels shows due to 'rare neurological disorder' - News24
